nodes.text: The Trandoshan Army was an army associated with the Trandoshan species. Prior to the rise of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY, the Trandoshan slaver Pekt hired former members of the Army to assist him in exterminating Wookiees, a species the Trandoshans had an ancient rivalry with. Pekt and his partners could allegedly clear a village of Wookiees in less than a week.
The Trandoshan Army was mentioned in Pekt's DataBank entry in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
